etat te kathitam bhūpa devī māhātmyam uttamam

original: evaṃprabhāvā sā devī yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat // MarkP_93.1 //
analyzed: evaṃprabhāvā sā devī yayā idam dhāryate jagat
vidyā tathā eva kriyate bhagavat viṣṇu māyayā
tathā tvam eṣa vaiśyaḥ ca tathā eva anye vivekinaḥ
mohyante mohitāḥ ca eva moham eṣyanti ca apare
tām upaihi mahā rāja śaraṇam parameśvarīm
ārādhitā sā eva nṛṇām bhoga svarga apavarga dā
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā surathaḥ sa narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā surathaḥ sa narādhipaḥ
praṇipatya mahābhāgam tam ṛṣim śaṃsita vratam
nirviṇṇaḥ ti mamatvena rājya apaharaṇena ca

original: jagama sadyastapase sa ca vaiśyo mahāmune // MarkP_93.5 //
analyzed: jagama sadyas tapase sa ca vaiśyaḥ mahā mune
saṃdarśana artham ambāyāḥ nadī pulina saṃsthitaḥ

original: sa ca vaiśyastapastepe devīsūktaṃ paraṃ japan // MarkP_93.6 //
analyzed: sa ca vaiśyaḥ tapaḥ tepe devī sūktam param japan

original: tau tasmin piline devyāḥ kṛtvā mūrti mahīmayīm /
analyzed: tau tasmin piline devyāḥ kṛtvā mūrti mahī mayīm
arhaṇām cakratuḥ tasyāḥ puṣpa dhūpa agni tarpaṇaiḥ
nirāhārau yata ātmānau tad manaskau samāhitau
dadatuḥ tau balim ca eva nija gātra asṛj ukṣitam
evam samārādhayatoḥ tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ yata ātmanoḥ

original: parituṣṭā jagaddhātrī pratyakṣaṃ prāha caṇḍikā // MarkP_93.9 //
analyzed: parituṣṭā jagaddhātrī pratyakṣam prāha caṇḍikā
śrī devī uvāca

original: yatprārthyate tvayā bhūpa tvayā ca kulanandana /
analyzed: yat prārthyate tvayā bhūpa tvayā ca kula nandana

original: mattastatprāpyatāṃ sarvaṃ parituṣṭā dadāmi tat // MarkP_93.10 //
analyzed: mattaḥ tat prāpyatām sarvam parituṣṭā dadāmi tat
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
tatas vavre nṛpaḥ rājyam avibhraṃśi anya janmani

original: atraiva ca nijaṃ rājyaṃ hataśatrubalaṃ balāt // MarkP_93.11 //
analyzed: atrā eva ca nijam rājyam hata śatru balam balāt
saḥ pi vaiśyaḥ tatas jñānam vavre nirviṇṇa mānasaḥ
mama iti aham iti prājñaḥ saṅga vicyuti kārakam
śrī devī uvāca
su alpaiḥ ahobhiḥ nṛpate svam rājyam prāpsyate bhavān

original: hatvā ripūnaskhalitaṃ tava tatra bhaviṣyati // MarkP_93.13 //
analyzed: hatvā ripūn a skhalitam tava tatra bhaviṣyati
mṛtaḥ ca bhūyas samprāpya janma devāt vivasvataḥ

original: sāvarṇiko nāma manurbhavān bhuvi bhaviṣyati // MarkP_93.14 //
analyzed: sāvarṇikaḥ nāma manuḥ bhavān bhuvi bhaviṣyati
vaiśya varya tvayā yaḥ ca smattaḥ bhivāñchataḥ

original: taṃ prayacchāmi saṃsiddhyai tava jñānaṃ bhaviṣyati // MarkP_93.15 //
analyzed: tam prayacchāmi saṃsiddhyai tava jñānam bhaviṣyati
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
iti dattvā tayoḥ devī yathā abhilaṣitam varam
babhūva antarhitā sadyas bhaktyā tābhyām abhiṣṭutā

original: evaṃ devyā varaṃ labdhvā surathaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ /
analyzed: evam devyāḥ varam labdhvā surathaḥ kṣatriya ṛṣabhaḥ
sūryāt janma samāsādya sāvarṇiḥ bhavitā manuḥ

original: iti śrīmārkaṇḍeyamahāpurāṇe sāvarṇike manvantare devīmāhātmye varapradānaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī mārkaṇḍeya mahāpurāṇe sāvarṇike manvantare devīmāhātmye varapradānam nāma trinavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
